Description: Fragment of Mediterranean Spondylus gaederopus.thorny oyster shell. Carved into the shape of scoop or spoon.
Curator's comments: Previously missidebntified as a modified tridacna species clam.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (WA.10)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.49)
